Prasanth Badabagni

Hyderabad, Telangana, India
Summary
Experienced Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of
working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled
in .NET Framework, C#, ASP.NET, MVC, WebAPI, AngularJS,
Angular, Bootstrap and CSS. Strong engineering professional with a
Bachelor of Technology (BTech) focused in Computer Science from
Hyderabad Institute of Technology and Management.

PROJECT #2
Duration : January, 2019 – Till Date
Role : Software Engineer
Technologies/Services : C#, .Net Core 2.2, PostgreSQL, AngularJS, APIGEE
API Gateway
Description:
Objective of this project is to create requests based on Excel Templates and
data provided by user while creating requests. Micro Services development
which provides end points to preform CRUD operations on data through
APIGEE Gateway.
Responsibilities: Micro Services based on Microsoft API Guidelines, Core
development, Understanding requirements, Unit test cases.
Key Achievements:
• Achieved working experience on creating Micro Services following guidelines
provided by Microsoft
PROJECT #1
Duration : October, 2018 – December, 2018
Role : Software Engineer
Page 1 of 2
Technologies : C#, .Net Core, PostgreSQL, AngularJS
Description:
Worked on a Tax Credit and Management System. Clients add their Research
and Development expenses in this system and get Tax benefits for their work. 
Responsibilities: 
Understanding requirements, Fixing issues, develop new features which
includes data reading from excel and Calculations.
Key Achievements:
• Establish a connection between .NET and PostgreSQL using npg sql
database and Martin.
• Understood the process of Excel bulk file Imports and Exports
